text:
A 71-year-old woman was found trampled to death by an elephant in her farm at Denkanikottai, making it the second human casualty in a week.

The victim Paappamma, wife of Maadhappa, was found trampled to death in their field on the fringes of the forest at Agalakottaai Panchayat, near Denkanikottai.

The couple had cultivated ragi in their field, and the deceased was visiting the field when she was reportedly attacked by a pachyderm.

The death of Paappamma comes on the heels of the death of a farmer in Shoolagiri last Sunday night when the victim Kaniappan, also a farmer, was killed by a tusker.

She was

attacked in

her ragi field on

the fringes of forest
title: Woman trampled to death by elephant
